card.name: Aqua Hulcus
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card.

card.name: Spiral Gate
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Bloody Squito
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When this creature wins a battle, destroy it.

card.name: Terror Pit
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures.

card.name: Horrid Worm
card.text: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, your opponent discards a card at random from his hand.

card.name: Locomotiver
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent discards a card at random from his hand.

card.name: Aqua Surfer
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Vile Mulder, Wing of the Void
card.text: ■ This creature can't attack creatures. ■ Double Breaker ■ When this creature battles, destroy it after the battle.

card.name: Melnia, the Aqua Shadow
card.text: ■ Multi ■ This creature can't be blocked. ■ Slayer

card.name: Storium, Light Ray Doll
card.text: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, all your other creatures can't attack this turn.

card.name: Aqua Super Emeral
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may add a card from your hand to your shields face down. If you do, choose one of your shields and put it into your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger" ability of that shield.

card.name: Drain Worm, the Parasite
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. That creature gets -1000 power until the End Step

card.name: Ganveet Twist
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Your opponent chooses a card from their hand and discards it. ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. That creature gets -3000 power until the End Step

card.name: Aqua Sonicwave
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose another creature in the battle zone that has power 4000 or less and return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Startdash Reviver, Crystalline Shadow
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your water or darkness creatures. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put a creature that costs 3 or less from your graveyard into the battle zone. ■ Double Breaker
